forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain and showers. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 9C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 48F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 61F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.
